newsitem.title: DENMARK: FORECAST - Denmark raises 1996 GDP growth expectation.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Denmark raises 1996 GDP growth expectation.

text.p: Denmark's Economy Ministry said in its latest economic survey issued on Tuesday it expected gross domestic product (GDP) to grow by 2.2 percent in 1996, 2.9 percent in 1997 and 2.7 percent in 1998.
Denmark's GDP grew by 2.6 percent in 1995.
The figures in the ministry's latest economic survey compared with a forecast for 1996 of 2.0 percent and 3.1 percent in 1997 in its last survey in October.
